column5: Share comfy-yet-elegant home in your private wing of this oak shaded house. Twin beds with private bath. Quiet neighborhood (stocked with deer to view and enjoy) about three miles outside Wimberley in the direction of Blanco. Enjoy a 2 mile hike to Jacobs Well or a quick 3 mile drive to quaint downtown or the famous Bluehole to swim or just relax under the cypress. Short drives to wonderful \
column8: Come unwind/play in country charm near Jacobs Well
